T02TD1809E:121a-1: sa ma dza s'a dha nam bya bastho le n'a ma /
T02TD1809E:121a-3: 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par gzhag pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD1809E:121a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1809E:121a-5: rdo rje gsum po mi phyed sku //
T02TD1809E:121a-6: rdo rje sems dpa' phyag byas te //
T02TD1809E:121a-7: 'dus pa'i sgrub thabs yan lag gi / rnam gzhag rim pa bshad par bya //
T02TD1809E:121b-0: de la @121b dang por re zhig dngos po med la zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa brjod nas snod la sogs pa'i dngos po rnams stong pa nyid du gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:121b-2: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02TD1809E:121b-3: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1809E:121b-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim gyis sa'i cha bsgrubs te /
T02TD1809E:121b-5: de'i steng du bhr'um las gzhal yas khang bskyed la /
T02TD1809E:121b-6: der mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i lha'i 'khor lo thams cad lhag par mos pas dgod par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:121b-10: rnal 'byor chen po'i rim pas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bdag nyid du bskyed de /
T02TD1809E:121b-11: dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyar ba las dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams phyung ste /
T02TD1809E:121b-12: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa byas nas gshegs su gsol ba 'di bsgom pa bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02TD1809E:121b-13: rnam par gzhag pa dang po nye bar bstan pa brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:121b-14: gang gi tshe 'dir 'jig rten du 'jig pa thob par gyur cing /
T02TD1809E:121b-15: khams gsum pa'i sems can gcig kyang ma lus par gyur nas snod kyi 'jig rten 'ba' zhig lus pa de'i tshe rim gyis rim gyis nyi ma bdun gyi 'od zer rnams rab tu bklags pas khams gsum pa bsregs te nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byed do //
T02TD1809E:121b-16: don 'di ltar bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos /
T02TD1809E:121b-17: dngos po med la zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:121b-18: de nas yang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rgyun gyi stobs las khad kyis khang kyis rlung rnams g-yos te /
T02TD1809E:121b-19: rlung de rnams 'phel bar gyur pa ni /
T02TD1809E:121b-20: rngams su ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu drug go //
T02TD1809E:121b-21: rgyar grangs med pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de nam mkha'i steng du chags par gyur nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor de las byung ba shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam gyi char gyi rgyun bab par gyur te /
T02TD1809E:121b-22: de las chu'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te /
T02TD1809E:121b-23: de'i tshad ni rngams su 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang stong phrag nyi shu'o //
T02TD1809E:121b-24: de yang slar chu la rlung gis bsrubs pas gser gyi rang bzhin gyi sa gzhi chu'i steng du chags te /
T02TD1809E:121b-25: de'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag nyi shu'o //
T02TD1809E:122a-0: me'i dkyil 'khor yang de dag gi @122a * //
T02TD1809E:122a-2: de ltar yang dag par bsgrub cing bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02TD1809E:122a-3: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02TD1809E:122a-4: rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02TD1809E:122a-5: zhes bya ba la sogs pas dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim pas sa'i cha bskyed par bya'o//
T02TD1809E:122a-6: de ltar sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis yang dag par byung ba'i rlung rnams kyis yang dag par bsrubs pas gser la sogs pa'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i ri rab la sogs pa'i ri dang /
T02TD1809E:122a-8: gling lcags ris bskor ba tshun chad du shing dang ljon pa dang lcug ma la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:122a-9: sred pa'i rim pa de ltar sgom par byed pa rnams kyis der ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzhung gis stong pa nyid dmigs pa sngon du song bas dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rim pas sa'i cha bskyed la /
T02TD1809E:122a-10: de'i steng du gzhal yas khang bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:122a-11: de nas rnam par shes pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'chang chen po sems can skyed par mdzad pa pos snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed kyi 'og tu sems can gyi khams nges par sprul par mdzad de /
T02TD1809E:122a-12: gnas ni bsgom pa sngon 'gro bas //
T02TD1809E:122a-13: rdo rje gsum bskyed bsgom par bya //
T02TD1809E:122a-15: der skye gnas bzhi po 'di lta ste /
T02TD1809E:122a-16: sgo nga las skyes pa dang /
T02TD1809E:122a-18: drod gsher las skyes pa dang /
T02TD1809E:122a-21: sgo nga las skyes pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122a-22: sems can gang dag sgo nga las skye bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1809E:122a-23: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122a-28: sha ri ka la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1809E:122a-29: mngal nas skye ba gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122a-30: sems can gang dag mngal nas skye ba ste /
T02TD1809E:122a-31: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122a-39: drod gsher las skyes pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122a-40: sems can gang dag 'byung ba'i drod las skyes pa ste /
T02TD1809E:122a-41: de dag kyang kang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122a-45: rdzus te skyes pa gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122b-0: sems can gang @122b dag dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma rdzogs pa med pa yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan par cig car skyes pa ste /
T02TD1809E:122b-1: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02TD1809E:122b-5: bskal pa dang po pa'i mi la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1809E:122b-7: gling gsum pa'i mi rnams kyang so sor gnas pa ma lags sam /
T02TD1809E:122b-8: ci'i slad du skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan gyi gnas mchog nas der 'jug par mi mdzad par 'dir nges pa kho nar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'jug cing mi rnams la chos ston pa'i rgyu nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol /
T02TD1809E:122b-9: rdo rje slob dpon gyis smras pa /
T02TD1809E:122b-11: nub kyi ba lang spyod dang /
T02TD1809E:122b-12: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams longs spyod chen po dang ldan te /
T02TD1809E:122b-13: de lta mod kyi blun zhing rmongs bas mi spyod cing mi 'byed do //
T02TD1809E:122b-14: 'dzam bu'i gling ba 'di ni las kyis pa yin te /
T02TD1809E:122b-15: de na legs par spyad pa dang /
T02TD1809E:122b-16: nyes par spyad pas mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sems can rnams su las kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pas 'dir snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:122b-17: 'di lta ste 'dzam bu'i gling ba'i mi rnams g-yo dang /
T02TD1809E:122b-20: phrag dog dang gdug pa'i bsam pas rims nad la sogs pas yongs su gzir bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:122b-21: 'o na kyang mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T02TD1809E:122b-22: dbang po rno zhing sgrin pa ste /
T02TD1809E:122b-23: des na byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzam bu'i gling gi skye bo'i gnas kyis dbus su sku 'khrungs shing chos ston par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:122b-25: mi ru 'khrungs pa nges tshul dang po ste //
T02TD1809E:122b-26: rab tu byung ba tshul ni gnyis pa'o //
T02TD1809E:122b-27: 'dul ba srung ba tshul chen gsum pa ste //
T02TD1809E:122b-28: ting 'dzin brnyes pa tshul mchog bzhi pa yin //
T02TD1809E:122b-29: zhes bya ba thun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs ba dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mi'i bdag nyid kyi srid par zhugs te thams cad mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi go 'phang brnyes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:123a-1: srid pa'i skye ba'i rim pa bstan to //
T02TD1809E:123a-2: de la bskal pa dang po pa'i mi rnams sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan cing yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus can yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad kyis mtshan pa /
T02TD1809E:123a-3: dbang po ma tshang ba med cing ma rdzogs pa med pa /
T02TD1809E:123a-4: kha dog gsal ba'i lus can /
T02TD1809E:123a-5: rang gi mthus nam mkhar 'gro ba /
T02TD1809E:123a-6: tshe ring zhing dga' ba la spyod pa /
T02TD1809E:123a-7: ye shes kyi lus can yin yang de rnams kyis sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mi shes shing ma shes pas na thog ma med pa'i dus nas mi shes pa'i bag chags kyi rgyun gyi stobs las rim gyis rang gi sems las byung ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mngon par zil gyis mnan par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:123a-8: de nas de dag gis yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus spangs te /
T02TD1809E:123a-9: nyon mongs pa'i rgyun gyi rim gyis tha mal ba'i mi'i bdag nyid kyi dngos por yongs su 'dzin to //
T02TD1809E:123a-10: de lta bu'i thugs rdo rje dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bas rang gi rang bzhin yongs su ma shes pas sems can gyi ris nas 'pho zhing /
T02TD1809E:123a-11: ji srid du skye ba'i tshogs pa ma rnyed pa de srid du nyin zhag bdun du srid pa bar ma dor gnas so zhes nges par bshad do //
T02TD1809E:123a-12: srid pa bar ma'i rang bzhin ji lta bu lags /
T02TD1809E:123a-14: 'chi ba'i srid pa dang skye ba'i srid pa'i bar na bdag gi ngo bo mngon par grub cing yul gzhan du skye ba grub pa de la srid pa bar ma zhes bya'o //
T02TD1809E:123a-15: de yang dbang po rno bar 'gyur te /
T02TD1809E:123a-16: ji ltar skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mtshan thams cad dang dpe byad dang lang tsho yongs su rdzogs pa de bzhin du srid pa bar ma na gnas pa yang ma'i rum du rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02TD1809E:123a-17: bye ba brgya yang 'di'i 'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byed do //
T02TD1809E:123a-18: ji skad du bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i mdo las gsungs te /
T02TD1809E:123a-19: de yang 'byung ba chen po rnams rab tu spangs te lha'i dran pa rab tu thob cing 'dod pa drug la spyod pa'i lha mthong ba dang dmyal ba bcu drug mthong ngo //
T02TD1809E:123a-20: de yang rkang pa dang lag pa ma tshang ba med cing rang gi ngo bor snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:123a-21: 'di ltar yang bdag gi lus de dang de ni 'di yin no zhes rab tu shes so //
T02TD1809E:123b-0: de yang ji skad du mdzod @123b kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T02TD1809E:123b-1: sngon dus srid pa'i sha tshugs can //
T02TD1809E:123b-2: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan //
T02TD1809E:123b-3: las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan //
T02TD1809E:123b-4: ris mthun lha mig dag pas mthong //
T02TD1809E:123b-6: 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom par byed pa rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor dang rjes su rnal 'byor gyi rim pas lha'i sku bskyed pa bstan te /
T02TD1809E:123b-7: ji ltar skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus mi rnams kyi don mdzad par mi spyod pas phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rjes su zhugs pas sprul pa'i sku 'dzin pa'i don du mngal du 'jug pa nyer bar bstan pa de bzhin du srid pa bar ma na gnas pa yang nyin zhag bdun pa dor te /
T02TD1809E:123b-8: thog ma med pa'i rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i las kyis yang dag par bskul te rim pa 'dis skye ba len to //
T02TD1809E:123b-9: de la rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1809E:123b-10: dang po'i bskal pa'i mi rnams bdud rtsi za ba nas ji srid du 'bras chan za ba yan chad kyis lus sra ba dang lci ba nyid kyis non te /
T02TD1809E:123b-12: de'i 'og tu mun pa skyes pas nyi ma dang zla ba dag 'jig rten du rab tu byung ba'o //
T02TD1809E:123b-13: de nas thabs dang shes rab kyi rnam par dbye ba bstan pa'i ched du de dag gi pho dang mo'i dbang po rab tu dod cing dbyibs tha dad cing /
T02TD1809E:123b-14: de dag sngon goms pa'i dbang gis gcig la gcig lta zhing phan tshun du chags pa'i sems skye'o //
T02TD1809E:123b-15: gang gi phyir log par zhugs pa de nas brtsams te pho dang mo zhes bya ba'i ming du 'jig rten du grags so //
T02TD1809E:123b-16: de nas dri za nye bar 'khor ba'i sems can gnas skabs gsum nye bar gyur pas ma'i rum du mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02TD1809E:123b-19: ma dang pha rjes su chags par 'gyur ba'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-0: de nas de dag phan tshun rjes su chags pas rdo rje byin gyis brlabs nas 'khyud pa dang 'o bya ba la sogs pa'i bya bas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba mthong bas 'dod pa nye bar len pa'i phyir srid pa bar ma spangs te rta zhon pa bzhin rnam par shes pa'i bdag po thugs rdo rje rlung gi bzhon pa la yang dag par @124a * //
T02TD1809E:124a-1: zhon nas shin tu myur bar 'ong zhing skad cig thang cig gam yud tsam gyis ye shes sems dpa' ltar rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas zhugs te /
T02TD1809E:124a-2: ye shes kyi sa thob nas thabs kyi ye shes dang lhan cig gnyis su med par gyur nas shin tu dga' bar chud pa'i snying po yin te /
T02TD1809E:124a-3: rgyud las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsungs pa'i rigs pa dang /
T02TD1809E:124a-4: shes rab kyi mdo las gnyis ka mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas tshim par byas pas rtsa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bskul te ;
T02TD1809E:124a-5: gnyi ga'ang mchog tu dga' ba'i bde bas tshim par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-6: a'a li dang k'a li rnams gcig tu gyur nas khams phra ba la zhugs pas shes rab dang /
T02TD1809E:124a-7: ye shes kyi 'od zer shar bas gnyi ga yang zhu bar gyur te khu ba dang khrag yang dag par 'dres nas skye gnas kyi dbus su thig le'i gzugs su babs so zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1809E:124a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga la zhugs so zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1809E:124a-12: dang por mer mer po'i rnam pa'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-13: mer mer po las ltar ltar por 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:124a-14: ltar ltar po las gor gor po'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-15: gor gor po las mkhrang gyur /
T02TD1809E:124a-16: mkhrang gyur la yang rlung gis bskul te /
T02TD1809E:124a-17: des rkang lag 'gyus te gnas skabs lnga gsal bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:124a-20: sen mo la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1809E:124a-22: gzugs dang mtshan ma rnams rim gyis skye'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-23: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa las sa bon gyi gnas skabs nas brtsams te gnas skabs lnga nges par skye'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-24: de la mer mer po ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-25: ltar ltar po ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-26: gor gor ni 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-27: mkhrang gyur ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-28: rkang lag 'gyus pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1809E:124a-29: khrag gi yang gnas skabs lngar bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:124b-0: de la zhu ba ni mi bskyod @124b pa'o ;
T02TD1809E:124b-1: / dmar po ni 'od dpag med kyi'o //
T02TD1809E:124b-2: gor gor po ni rim chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
T02TD1809E:124b-3: mkhrang gyur ni don yod par grub pa'o //
T02TD1809E:124b-4: yang dag par 'dres pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02TD1809E:124b-6: skye gnas dbus kyi rtsa gnyis ni //
T02TD1809E:124b-7: g-yas dang g-yon na de bzhin gnas //
T02TD1809E:124b-8: g-yon na khu ba shes par bya //
T02TD1809E:124b-9: g-yas pa na ni khrag nyid de //
T02TD1809E:124b-10: de dag gcig tu 'dres pa nyid //
T02TD1809E:124b-11: chos kyi dbyings su bsdus pa yin //
T02TD1809E:124b-13: de ltar na mer mer po la sogs pas sa bon dang myu gu bzhin yongs su smin pa thob ste /
T02TD1809E:124b-14: mngal gyi snod kyi nang du las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i rlung rgyu ba gang dag gis mngal gyi snod yongs su bsgyur nas ma'i rum nas chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi sgor mngon par phyogs shing gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:124b-15: de yang pho zhig yin na ma'i rum gyi g-yas su brten cing rgyab tu mngon par bltas te tsog tsog por gnas so //
T02TD1809E:124b-16: gal te mo zhig na de'i phyir mngal gyi g-yon du brten te lte bar mngon par bltas te gnas so //
T02TD1809E:124b-17: de'i 'og tu zla ba bcu'i tha mar rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i ring nge 'dzin la yang dag par bstan pa'i rim pas ma'i mngal nas 'thon par gyur te /
T02TD1809E:124b-18: de'i phyir dri za nye bar 'khor gyi sems can sha'i mig gi yul du gyur to //
T02TD1809E:124b-19: de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD1809E:124b-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi sems rdo rje zhal gsum pa lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par gzigs par gyur to zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1809E:124b-22: chu yi khams ni pha yin te //
T02TD1809E:124b-23: me yi khams ni ma zhes bya //
T02TD1809E:124b-24: pags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni //
T02TD1809E:124b-25: ma zhes su ni bstan pa yin //
T02TD1809E:124b-26: rus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams //
T02TD1809E:124b-27: pha zhes su yang bstan pa yin //
T02TD1809E:124b-28: de ci ma zhig tu bstan pa yin //
T02TD1809E:124b-29: lus kyi gong bu bsdus pa'o //
T02TD1809E:124b-30: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
T02TD1809E:124b-31: 'du byed rnam par shes pa nyid //
T02TD1809E:124b-32: phung po la sogs sangs rgyas lnga'i //
T02TD1809E:124b-33: rang bzhin dngos zhes bstan pa yin //
T02TD1809E:124b-34: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo bzhis zhus pa'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs so //
T02TD1809E:125a-1: 'dis rnal 'byor bzhi las bsgrubs pa ni bdag yin no zhes sngags pas nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan to //
T02TD1809E:125a-2: rnam par dgod pa bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste dang po'o /
T02TD1809E:125a-4: // / da ni rnam par gzhag pa'i rim pa gnyis pa nye bar bstan pa'i phyir dang po kho nar sku'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:125a-5: tshangs pa'i thig nas yang dag brtsam //
T02TD1809E:125a-6: grub bzhi ba ru rnam par dbye //
T02TD1809E:125a-7: gzhal yang khang ltar snang ba yis //
T02TD1809E:125a-10: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya dang //
T02TD1809E:125a-11: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1809E:125a-12: dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa ste //
T02TD1809E:125a-13: dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum du brtags //
T02TD1809E:125a-14: zhes 'dus pa'i rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so //
T02TD1809E:125a-15: de ltar gyur ba'i rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rnams dgod pa'i gyu dang 'bras bu gsungs pa /
T02TD1809E:125a-16: de la gzugs kyi phur po ni rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD1809E:125a-17: tshor ba'i phung po ni rin chen 'byung ldan //
T02TD1809E:125a-18: 'du shes kyi phung po ni 'od dpag med /
T02TD1809E:125a-19: 'du byed kyi phung po ni don yod grub pa /
T02TD1809E:125a-20: rnam par shes pa ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02TD1809E:125a-21: de'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1809E:125a-22: mdor na phung po lnga rnams ni //
T02TD1809E:125a-23: sangs rgyas lnga ru rab tu bsgrags //
T02TD1809E:125a-25: des na phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:125a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dgod pa las /
T02TD1809E:125a-27: phung po lnga byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur te /
T02TD1809E:125a-28: ji skad du rtsa ba'i rgyud las ;
T02TD1809E:125a-29: gti mug zhe sdang chags pa dang //
T02TD1809E:125a-30: yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig rnams //
T02TD1809E:125a-31: de ltar rigs ni lnga nyid de //
T02TD1809E:125a-32: 'dod dang thar par ba sgrub byed //
T02TD1809E:125a-34: lha mo rnams rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa /
T02TD1809E:125a-35: gti mug dga' ma spyan ma ni sa'i khams so //
T02TD1809E:125a-36: zhe sdang dga' ma m'a ma k'i ni chu'i khams so //
T02TD1809E:125a-37: 'dod chags dga' ma gos dkar mo ni me'i khams so //
T02TD1809E:125a-38: rdo rje dga' ma sgrol ma ni rlung gi khams so //
T02TD1809E:125a-39: don de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1809E:125a-40: sa yi khams ni spyan mar bshad //
T02TD1809E:125a-41: chu yi khams ni m'a ma k'i //
T02TD1809E:125b-0: me ni gos @125b dkar mor bshad de //
T02TD1809E:125b-1: rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu grags //
T02TD1809E:125b-3: de ltar khams rnams kyi yang rang gi mtshan nyid shes par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:125b-4: lha mo rnams bkod pas khams rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid stsol bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:125b-5: mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gsungs pa /
T02TD1809E:125b-6: bcom ldan 'das thugs rdo rje de nyid kyis sa'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin mig gi dbang po la bkod pas gzugs gsum la 'od gsal bas thogs med pa'i rdo rje'i mig gi dbang po stsol par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:125b-7: de bzhin du phyag na rdo rje rna ba la bkod pas sgra gsum la de bzhin du thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i rna ba'i dbang po rab tu stsol lo //
T02TD1809E:125b-8: nam mkha'i snying po sna la bkod pas dri gsum la thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje sna'i dbang po rab tu stsol lo //
T02TD1809E:125b-9: 'jig rten dbang phyug lce la bkod pas ro gsum la thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje lce'i dbang po rab tu ster ro //
T02TD1809E:125b-10: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa mtha' drug la bkod pas ye shes gsum la thogs pa med pa'i gzhan gyi sems shes ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu stsol lo //
T02TD1809E:125b-11: bcom ldan 'das sgrib pa rnam par sel ba lus kyi dbang po la bkod pas sgrib pa med par nang gi khams rnams gcig la gcig bsdus te skye ba la rab tu zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku rab tu bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:125b-12: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po tshigs thams cad la bkod pas 'od gsal du tshigs thams cad gzigs par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:125b-13: bcom ldan 'das byams ba rgyus pa'i rang bzhin la bkod pas rgyus pa'i rang bzhin 'od gsal bar rab tu 'jug go //
T02TD1809E:125b-14: bcom ldan 'das de nyid gzugs gsum gyi rnam pas phyi rol lta bur snang bas mig gi dbang po la bde ba stsol ba'i gzugs rdo rje'o //
T02TD1809E:125b-15: de ltar sgra rdo rje la sogs ba rnams kyang khong du chud par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:125b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1809E:125b-19: khams gsum pa ni ma lus kun //
T02TD1809E:125b-20: de yi nye bar longs spyod nyid //
T02TD1809E:126a-0: ces bde mchog las gsungs te 'dis lha mo rnams dgod pa'i rang bzhin @126a * //
T02TD1809E:126a-1: yongs su shes pas yul rnam par dag pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:126a-2: don 'di nyid gsal bar rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1809E:126a-3: rdo rje skye mched nyid dag kyang //
T02TD1809E:126a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog / ces pa dang /
T02TD1809E:126a-5: gzugs sgra dri ro sngags pa yis //
T02TD1809E:126a-6: lha rnams su ni rtag par bsgom //
T02TD1809E:126a-8: yan lag thams cad la khro bo rnams bkod ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gsungs pa //
T02TD1809E:126a-9: lag ba g-yas la gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1809E:126a-10: g-yon la gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
T02TD1809E:126a-11: kha yi padmar rta mgrin bsam //
T02TD1809E:126a-12: rdo rjer bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste //
T02TD1809E:126a-13: dpung ba g-yas par mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1809E:126a-15: pus mo g-yas bar bsam bya ba //
T02TD1809E:126a-16: dbyug pa sngon po 'bar chen po //
T02TD1809E:126a-17: pus mo g-yon la stobs po che //
T02TD1809E:126a-18: spyi bor gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1809E:126a-19: rkang mthil gnyis su bsam bya ba //
T02TD1809E:126a-20: gnod mdzes rgyal po rnam par bsam //
T02TD1809E:126a-21: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di dag ni sgrub ba bo'i yan lag la bkod pas 'bad pa med par zhal gsum phyag drug ba'i rnam pa lta bu nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor las byung nas phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs la bsdigs bar mdzad do //
T02TD1809E:126a-23: khro bo zhe sdang gnas las skyes //
T02TD1809E:126a-24: rtag tu gsod la brtson pa ste //
T02TD1809E:126a-26: sgrub pa'i mchog la chos can yin //
T02TD1809E:126a-28: sku'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhag pa'i rim par phye ba ste gnyis pa'o /
T02TD1809E:126a-30: // / sku'i dkyil 'khor la lha rnams dgod pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu rtogs pa'i sngags pas gzhan gyi don bsgrub ba'i phyir sku'i dkyil 'khor las phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor rim pa 'dis sprul bar bya ste /
T02TD1809E:126a-31: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02TD1809E:126a-32: sems las rang gi rigs kyi bu mo spro ba'am /
T02TD1809E:126a-33: yang na phyi rol gyi bu mo blangs la sgrub thabs las gsungs pa'i rim pas dbang po gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba byas te /
T02TD1809E:126a-34: sngon du gsungs pa'i rim pas gzhal yas khang bsgrubs la byang chub kyi sems las sgrub cing badzra dhri ka ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags brjod de lha thams cad kyi 'khor lo spro bar bya'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-0: phyung @126b ba'i dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags bstan par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:126b-1: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ston pa'i rdo rje bsnams pas na rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02TD1809E:126b-2: 'dis nyon mongs pa zhe sdang rnam par sbyangs nas slar byon te rdo rje 'chang chen po dang gnyis su med par gyur te /
T02TD1809E:126b-3: kha sbyar gyi sbyor bas mi bskyod pa'i gzugs kyis bzhugs so //
T02TD1809E:126b-4: de bzhin du rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i chos kyi 'khor los bdud bzhi las rgyal bas na rgyal ba'i rgyal ba'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-5: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rin po che 'dzin pas na rin chen 'chang ngo //
T02TD1809E:126b-7: ro ni 'khor ba ste 'khor ba las 'das shing 'gro bas na 'khor 'das so //
T02TD1809E:126b-8: rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni shes rab ste /
T02TD1809E:126b-9: de 'dzin pas na shes rab 'chang ngo //
T02TD1809E:126b-10: gti mug ni rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02TD1809E:126b-11: de la dga' bas na gti mug dga' ma'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-12: zhe sdang ni mi bskyod pa ste /
T02TD1809E:126b-13: de la dga' bas na zhe sdang dga' ma'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-15: de la dga' bas na 'dod chags dga' ma'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-16: rdo rje ni don yod par grub pa ste /
T02TD1809E:126b-17: de la dga' bas na rdo rje dga' ma'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-18: sa ltar mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de nyid snying po ste /
T02TD1809E:126b-19: nang gi bdag nyid gang la yod pa de ni sa'i snying po'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-20: ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje 'chang bar mdzad pas na phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-21: nam mkha' ni sgrib pa dang bral ba'i ye shes te de nyid snying po ste nam mkha'i snying bo'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams dbang du byed pas na 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
T02TD1809E:126b-23: 'od gsal zhing yid du 'ong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul ba'i dpal yod pas na 'jam dpal lo //
T02TD1809E:126b-24: sgrib pa thams cad ni nyon mongs pa rnams sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis man na bas na sgrib pa thams cad sel ba'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-25: kun nas mdzes pas na kun du bzang bo'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-26: byams pa'i yon tan gang la yod ba ni byams pa'o//
T02TD1809E:126b-27: blta bar bya bas na gzugs so //
T02TD1809E:126b-28: mnyan par bya bas na sgra'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-29: bsnam par bya bas na dri'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-30: myang bar bya bas na ro'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-31: reg par bya bas na reg bya'o //
T02TD1809E:126b-32: rdo rje'i sgras ni de dag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa bstan to //
T02TD1809E:127a-0: gshin rdo rje ni dmyal ba ste de @127a * //
T02TD1809E:127a-1: 'joms pa dang ldan ba'i phyir te /
T02TD1809E:127a-2: khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mthar byed bas na gshin rje mthar byed do //
T02TD1809E:127a-3: shes rab kyis 'ching ba rnams mthar byed pas na shes rab mthar byed do //
T02TD1809E:127a-4: padma ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag bas na padma mthar byed do //
T02TD1809E:127a-5: bgegs ni bdud bzhi ste de 'joms pa dang ldan pas na khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de rnams mthar byed pas na bgegs mthar byed do //
T02TD1809E:127a-6: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis rtag tu sems rab tu bskyod pa rnams rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mnan cing bcom pas na mi g-yo ba'o //
T02TD1809E:127a-8: de bsal bar byed cing rnam par dag bar byed pas na 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
T02TD1809E:127a-9: sngon po ni sems can rnams kyi sdig ba'i sdigs ba'i las so //
T02TD1809E:127a-10: dbyig ba ni de chad pas tshar gcod pa ste /
T02TD1809E:127a-11: de byed pas na dbyug sngon no //
T02TD1809E:127a-12: don dam pa'i stobs kyis sems can rnams kyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pas na stobs po che'o //
T02TD1809E:127a-13: sems can rnams la khams gsum las rnam par sgrol ba'i ye shes stsol bas na gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02TD1809E:127a-14: phyogs bcu'i bgegs kyi tshogs nges bar bkug nas phur bus 'debs pas na gnod mdzes rgyal po'o //
T02TD1809E:127a-15: lha sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag gi sprul pa'i sku zhal gsum phyag drug ba mtshan ma'i phyag mtshan sna tshogs phyag na bsnams pa rnams byang chub kyi sems las sngags kyi gzugs kyis sprul pa yang 'bad pa med pa nyid kyis sgrub pa po'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor las phyung ste /
T02TD1809E:127a-16: bsod nams kyi tshogs 'phel bar bya ba'i don du 'dod chags dang zhes sdang dang gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnams ting nge 'dzin de dang nges sbyangs nas slar byon te rang rang gi stan la bzhugs par gyur to //
T02TD1809E:127a-22: dril bu rnam grangs bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi mtshan mar gsungs te /
T02TD1809E:127a-23: de nyid ni mtshon cha lta bur bsnams so //
T02TD1809E:127a-24: zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa'i las kyi dbye bas kha dog so sor bya'o //
T02TD1809E:127b-0: rin po che thams cad dang @127b ldan pa'i phyir mdog aindra n'i la lta bu'o //
T02TD1809E:127b-1: phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid bshad pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD1809E:127b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i bha ga la rdul dang bral ba'i dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa ni /
T02TD1809E:127b-3: gsal ba de yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1809E:127b-4: sna tshogs gzugs kyis kun du mtshan //
T02TD1809E:127b-5: sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun du khyab //
T02TD1809E:127b-6: 'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug / gsal ba la sogs dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02TD1809E:127b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gzhi //
T02TD1809E:127b-10: gal te rgyud 'di la lag pa'i phyag rgya med na 'di ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa'i lha'i sku ba skyed par 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:127b-12: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ma lus pas brgyan ba'i gzhir gyur ba'i lha'i sku ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02TD1809E:127b-13: btsun mo ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1809E:127b-14: sngags kyi yi ge ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1809E:127b-15: gzugs sna tshogs kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byed cing sgrub ba ni las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02TD1809E:127b-17: de kho na nyid bsdus pa la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1809E:127b-18: gnyi ga'i rgyud las ni zhal gcig par rab tu grags na /
T02TD1809E:127b-19: ci'i phyir 'dir zhal gsum pa lta bur snang bar 'gyur /
T02TD1809E:127b-21: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis 'di'i don bshad pa'i rgyud dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud las /
T02TD1809E:127b-22: gang zhig phyi nang bdag gyur dang //
T02TD1809E:127b-23: de nyid gnyis ka'i rtog pa rnams //
T02TD1809E:127b-24: gnyis su med par bshad pa ste //
T02TD1809E:127b-25: 'di yi de nyid chen po yin //
T02TD1809E:127b-26: lag ba g-yon par rab grags pa'i //
T02TD1809E:127b-27: mthe'u chung tha ltag gung mo dang //
T02TD1809E:127b-28: de bzhin na mdzub mo mthe bong ni //
T02TD1809E:127b-29: rim bzhin gzugs la sogs par gzung //
T02TD1809E:127b-30: de rnams dngos po med pa yin //
T02TD1809E:127b-31: shes rab rnam par 'byed mtshan nyid //
T02TD1809E:127b-32: chos kyi sku ru rnam par bshad //
T02TD1809E:127b-33: de bzhin nyid dang gnyis med ming ;
T02TD1809E:127b-34: / mi bskyod rin chen dpag med dang //
T02TD1809E:127b-35: don yod rnam snang de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1809E:127b-36: 'di dag lag pa g-yas pa yi //
T02TD1809E:127b-37: mthe'u chung la sogs rim bzhin gnas //
T02TD1809E:127b-38: gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar ba yi //
T02TD1809E:127b-39: 'di yi de nyid skyabs gsum pa //
T02TD1809E:128a-2: / gcig kyang gsum du brtags pa yin //
T02TD1809E:128a-3: phan tshun sbyor bas rdo rje sems //
T02TD1809E:128a-4: shes rab thabs kyi go 'phang mchog / thal mo sbyor ba tsam gyis ni //
T02TD1809E:128a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'gugs //
T02TD1809E:128a-6: skyabs gsum de nyid gsum yin te //
T02TD1809E:128a-7: sku gsum rnam par thar gsum gyi //
T02TD1809E:128a-8: zhal gsum yin te mdog gsum yang //
T02TD1809E:128a-9: sbyor gsum dam tshig gsum sbyor bas //
T02TD1809E:128a-10: khams gsum du ni lha gsum gyi //
T02TD1809E:128a-11: dkyil 'khor gsum gyis dus gsum du //
T02TD1809E:128a-12: lam gsum gyis ni mchog gsum gyi //
T02TD1809E:128a-13: ji snyed du ni rtogs bas bskul //
T02TD1809E:128a-14: gsol ba 'debs pa yid la byed //
T02TD1809E:128a-15: 'jig rten rnams kyi don rnams byed //
T02TD1809E:128a-16: yang dag sangs rgyas de mnyes 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:128a-17: de nyid 'dir ni thal mor gnas //
T02TD1809E:128a-18: sems can gang de sangs rgyas yin //
T02TD1809E:128a-19: de bzhin nyid dang gnyis med chos //
T02TD1809E:128a-20: gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1809E:128a-21: sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128a-24: 'dir gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor la lha rnams dgod pa slob dpon sna tshogs pa'i gzhung 'jig rten du rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te //
T02TD1809E:128a-25: de ji ltar sgrub pa po rnams som nyi ma mchis par 'gyur /
T02TD1809E:128a-26: sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so //
T02TD1809E:128a-27: lung dang rigs pas so sor bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:128a-28: ji ltar sku'i dkyil 'khor la phung po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi lha rnams ming gis dgod pa de bzhin du phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha rnams dgod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:128a-29: de lta mod kyi rtsa ba'i rgyud las lha dgod pa rdzogs par ma bstan ba ni 'di ltar slob dpon med par 'jug par ma gyur cig snyam du dgongs so //
T02TD1809E:128a-30: dkyil 'khor dgod pa yang gcig tu yongs su rdzogs par bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud las yang dag par gsungs te de la 'jug par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:128a-31: sems kyis gzhan ni mi bsam bar //
T02TD1809E:128a-32: sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1809E:128a-33: rdo rje slob dpon lus 'di la //
T02TD1809E:128a-34: rgyal ba'i sku ni rim bzhin gnas //
T02TD1809E:128a-35: dang po sku yi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1809E:128a-36: gzugs phung la ni rab tu bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-0: @128b rjes su chags pa'i rdo rje ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-1: tshor ba'i phung por rab tu bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-2: bcom ldan gsung gi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-3: 'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-4: mchod pa kun gyi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-5: 'du byed kyi ni phung por bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-6: bcom ldan thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-7: rnam shes phung por yang dag bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-8: 'di yi sha sogs sa khams la //
T02TD1809E:128b-9: bcom ldan 'das yum spyan ma bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-10: khrag sogs chu yi khams la ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-11: bcom ldan 'das yum m'a ma bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-12: dro ba la sogs me khams la //
T02TD1809E:128b-13: bcom ldan 'das yum gos dkar bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-14: bskyod pa la sogs rlung khams la ;
T02TD1809E:128b-15: / bcom ldan 'das yum sgrol ma bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-16: de yi mig gi dbang gnyis la //
T02TD1809E:128b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa sa snying po //
T02TD1809E:128b-18: de yi rna ba'i dbang gnyis la //
T02TD1809E:128b-19: bde gshegs phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD1809E:128b-20: de yi sna yi dbang gnyis la //
T02TD1809E:128b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa mkha' snying bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-22: de lce dbang la bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang //
T02TD1809E:128b-24: khams bzhi'i rang bzhin gong bu ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-25: rang gi lus zhes bya ming la //
T02TD1809E:128b-26: sgrib ba thams cad rnams sel ba //
T02TD1809E:128b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dir bzhugs so //
T02TD1809E:128b-28: de yi yid kyi dbang po la //
T02TD1809E:128b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dbyangs bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:128b-30: lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad la //
T02TD1809E:128b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'o //
T02TD1809E:128b-32: lag pa g-yas pa'i rtsa bar ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje gshed //
T02TD1809E:128b-34: lag pa g-yon pa'i rtsa bar ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-35: bder gshegs gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
T02TD1809E:128b-36: kha yi padmar bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-37: de bzhin gshegs pa rta mgrin no //
T02TD1809E:128b-38: gsang ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-39: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'khyil //
T02TD1809E:128b-40: dbung pa g-yas bar bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa mi g-yo ba //
T02TD1809E:128b-42: dpung ba g-yon bar bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-43: de bzhin gshegs ba 'dod ba'i rgyal //
T02TD1809E:128b-44: pus mo g-yas na bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-45: de bzhin gshegs pa dbyug pa sngon //
T02TD1809E:128b-46: pus mo g-yon la bzhugs ba ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-47: de bzhin gshegs pa stobs po che //
T02TD1809E:128b-48: rang gi spyi bor bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:128b-49: de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor los sgyur //
T02TD1809E:128b-50: rkang ba'i mthil du bzhugs pa ni //
T02TD1809E:129a-1: bzhin gshegs pa gnod mdzes te //
T02TD1809E:129a-3: sku yi dkyil 'khor zhes brjod pa //
T02TD1809E:129a-4: rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyi lus //
T02TD1809E:129a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku rdzogs pa //
T02TD1809E:129a-6: 'di dag ma lus rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02TD1809E:129a-7: rdo rje legs byes bstan pa ni /
T02TD1809E:129a-10: khyod kyi dge ba yongs su smin //
T02TD1809E:129a-11: de ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi //
T02TD1809E:129a-12: lus la rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs //
T02TD1809E:129a-13: nyon cig mthong ba don yod kye /
T02TD1809E:129a-14: phyi ma'i dus na sems dpa'i chen //
T02TD1809E:129a-15: dang po'i las kyi sems can gyi //
T02TD1809E:129a-16: rab tu 'bad de bla ma bsten //
T02TD1809E:129a-17: de tshe mthong ba don yod bcas //
T02TD1809E:129a-18: byang chub sems dpa' grags ba che //
T02TD1809E:129a-19: dga' zhing mgu la rab dang ldan //
T02TD1809E:129a-20: phyag 'tshal nas ni mchi ma blags //
T02TD1809E:129a-23: nyon mongs ba thams cad spangs ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brnyes pa rnams 'dir tha ma la ba'i lus la dgod pa mi 'gal lags sam //
T02TD1809E:129a-25: ji srid du bkur bshal gyi snod yin ba'i gnas skabs su ni mchil ma 'dor la gzhong ba'i gnas skabs su 'jig rten pa rnams zas za'o //
T02TD1809E:129a-26: gzugs brnyan gyi gnas skabs su mchod par byed do //
T02TD1809E:129a-27: de bzhin du tha mal ba'i lus la 'dod chags dang zhes dang ga ti mug la sogs pas brlan ba'i sngon gyi gnas skabs su 'khor ba'i rgyu yin la phyis rang bzhin yongs su shes shing yongs su dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba la skyon med do //
T02TD1809E:129a-29: shin tu mi gtsang gzugs 'di gzung byas la //
T02TD1809E:129a-30: rgyal ba'i rin chen gzugs byas rin thang med //
T02TD1809E:129a-31: rtsi yis sbyangs ba lta bur bskyed pa 'di //
T02TD1809E:129a-32: byang chub sems ni rab tu brtan bar gzung //
T02TD1809E:129a-34: de bzhin du yang dkon mchog brtsegs ba'i mdo las //
T02TD1809E:129a-35: 'od srungs 'di lta ste lud kyis g-yogs ba'i sa gzhi las bo na thams cas skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:129b-0: 'od srungs de bzhin du nyon mongs ba'i lud kyis khyab ba'i 'jig rten pa rnams la byang chub @129b sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs ba dang /
T02TD1809E:129b-1: dgongs ba lung ston bzhes bya ba'i rgyud la skyang //
T02TD1809E:129b-2: phra mo'i sbyor don de nyid shes //
T02TD1809E:129b-3: phyag na rdo rje grags chen la //
T02TD1809E:129b-4: 'gro ba gnyis med sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1809E:129b-5: phra mo'i de nyid dgongs bas gsungs //
T02TD1809E:129b-6: mngon bar byang chub rnam lnga 'di //
T02TD1809E:129b-7: ma 'ongs skyes ba'i rgyu can yin //
T02TD1809E:129b-8: chos rnams yang dag brjod pa'i sku //
T02TD1809E:129b-9: ji lta ji ltar yin gsungs pa //
T02TD1809E:129b-10: phung po 'di dag sangs rgyas yin //
T02TD1809E:129b-11: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rkyen du 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:129b-12: gnyis med de bzhin nyid 'jug pas //
T02TD1809E:129b-13: de yang de bzhin gshegs par gsungs //
T02TD1809E:129b-15: phyung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim par phye ba ste gsum pa'o /
T02TD1809E:129b-17: // / da ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1809E:129b-18: mdor bstan pa'i tshig rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:129b-19: dam tshig khu phyung cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1809E:129b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsad nas //
T02TD1809E:129b-22: dngos grub rab mchog thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:129b-23: zhes le'u bdun pa las mdor bstan te /
T02TD1809E:129b-24: 'di'i bshad pa dgongs ba lung ston pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD1809E:129b-25: gzugs sogs nang gi chos rnams ni //
T02TD1809E:129b-26: mthong ba lhag mthong zhes bshad de //
T02TD1809E:129b-27: mi bskyod pa sogs grangs bzhin du //
T02TD1809E:129b-28: brtags pa dag ni zhi gnas bya //
T02TD1809E:129b-30: de bzhin nyid ni zhi ming can //
T02TD1809E:129b-31: de bzhin nyid kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02TD1809E:129b-32: rnal 'byor bas ni sangs rgyas gzhug /'di yang slar bshad ba rdo rje phreng ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las gsungs te /
T02TD1809E:129b-34: gzugs phung rtogs la me long dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-35: sa khams mig gi dbang po dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-36: gzugs dang rnam ldar gyur ba ste //
T02TD1809E:129b-37: khro bo byams par yang dag ldan //
T02TD1809E:129b-38: tshor ba'i phung po mnyam nyid dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-39: chu khams rna ba'i dbang po dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-40: sgra dang rnam lngar gyur pa ste //
T02TD1809E:129b-41: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1809E:129b-42: 'du shes so sor rtog ba dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-43: byin za sna yi dbang po dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-44: dri dang rnam ldar gyur ba ste //
T02TD1809E:129b-45: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1809E:129b-46: 'du byed bya ba grub pa dang //
T02TD1809E:129b-47: rlung khams lce yi dbang po dang //
T02TD1809E:130a-2: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1809E:130a-3: steng 'og khro bo shin tu bcas //
T02TD1809E:130a-4: rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid //
T02TD1809E:130a-5: rnam shes phung por bzhugs pa ste //
T02TD1809E:130a-6: rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o //
T02TD1809E:130a-7: mya ngan 'das bcas kun stong dang//
T02TD1809E:130a-8: chos kyi skur yang bshad ba yin //
T02TD1809E:130a-9: brtan par bya ba'i don du ni // gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1809E:130a-10: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra s'a bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1809E:130a-11: rnam par gzhag ba bzhi pa 'di nyid kyis rdzogs pa la gnas ba nye bar bshad par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:130a-12: de las gzugs kyi phung po 'od gsal du zhugs ba'i mtshan ma mkhas pas shes bar bya ste /
T02TD1809E:130a-13: yan lag thams cad phra ba dang /
T02TD1809E:130a-14: lus kyi nyam chung zhing lhod par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-15: me long lta bu'i ye shes thim pa na rab rib tu 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-16: sa'i khams 'gags ba na lus thams cad skams par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-17: mig gi dbang po 'gags ba na mig 'gyur zhing zum par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-18: gzugs kyi yul 'gags pa na rang gi lus kyi ma dangs med cing nyams zad ba nyid du 'gyur ro /
T02TD1809E:130a-19: de / ltar 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas rkang med dang //
T02TD1809E:130a-22: rkang mangs la sogs pa'i sems can rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can rnams sku'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te //
T02TD1809E:130a-23: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor du skad cig pa'i rim gyis 'jug go //
T02TD1809E:130a-24: gang dag cha shas la gnas pa de dag gi ni 'dir rnam par gzhag ba med mod kyi //
T02TD1809E:130a-25: 'on kyang rim gyis don dam pa'i bden par rab tu 'jug go //
T02TD1809E:130a-26: de bzhin du gnyis pa rin po che'i rigs kyi lha rnams don dam pa'i bden par 'jug pa de'i tshe mtshan ma mkhas pas shes par bya ste /
T02TD1809E:130a-27: tshor ba'i phung po thim pa na rlung dang mkhris pa dang dkan dang 'dus pa la sogs pa lus tshor ba mnyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-28: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thim pa na yid kyi tshor ba rnam pa gsum dran par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-29: cha'i khams skams ba na rang gi lus la kha chud ba khrag dang khu ba la sogs ba skams bar 'gyur ro//
T02TD1809E:130a-30: rna ba'i dbang bo thim pa na phyi dang nang du bcas ba'i sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130a-31: sgra'i yul thim pa na rang gi lus kyi sgra thos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-0: gnyis pa rin po che'i rigs @130b kyi lha rjes su gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1809E:130b-1: gsum pa padma'i rigs kyi lha rnams 'jug ba'i dus su mtshan ma mkhas pas shis bar bya ste //
T02TD1809E:130b-2: 'du shes kyi phung po thim ba na rkang gnyis pa la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dran par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-3: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thim pa na pha dang ma dang bu dang gnyen la sogs pa rnams dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi ming mi dran no //
T02TD1809E:130b-4: me'i khams thim pa na bza' ba thams cad mi 'ju'o //
T02TD1809E:130b-5: sna'i dbang bo thim ba na steng gi rlung rtse gcing rtse gcing sar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-6: dri'i yul thim pa na rang gi lus la dri'i yul bro bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-7: gsum pa padma'i rigs kyi lha rjes su gzhug pa'o //
T02TD1809E:130b-8: bzhi pa las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams kyi yang dag ba'i mthar 'jug pa'i mtshan ma mkhas pas shes par bya ste //
T02TD1809E:130b-9: de la 'du byed kyi phung po thim pa na lus kyi bya ba thams cad la 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-10: bya ba grub pa'i ye shes thim pa na 'jig rten pa'i bya ba dang dgos pa dran par mi 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-11: rlung gi khams thim pa na srog la sogs pa'i rlung bcu rang gi gnas nas 'pho'o //
T02TD1809E:130b-12: lce'i dbang po thim pan lce sbom pa dang thung ba dang rtsa ba sngon por 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-13: ro'i lus thim pa na ro drug nyams su mi myong ngo //
T02TD1809E:130b-14: bzhi ba las kyi rigs kyi lha rnams rjes su gzhug ba'o //
T02TD1809E:130b-15: lhag ma rang bzhin gyi snang ba 'jam dpal gyis ye shes rim pa gnyis par bya ste //
T02TD1809E:130b-16: de yang srog dang rtsol ba dang bcas par rdo rje bzlas ba'i rim pas gnas te /
T02TD1809E:130b-18: rjes su gzhig ba'i rim pas mi shigs pa mngon sum gud bya ste /
T02TD1809E:130b-19: 'dzin pa nye bar bsdus nas de'i tshe /
T02TD1809E:130b-20: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& am ta zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis don mngon sum byed par 'gyur ro //
T02TD1809E:130b-22: sngags 'di'i don bcom ldan 'das rdo rje slob dpon ston pas bshad du gsol //
T02TD1809E:130b-23: rdo rje slob dpon gyis gsungs pa //
T02TD1809E:130b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i rgyud las gsungs te //
T02TD1809E:130b-26: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
T02TD1809E:130b-27: pra mo'i sbyor ba rnam par gzhu / aom zhes pas ni gcig dang ldan //
T02TD1809E:130b-28: sh'u n+ya t'a ni gnyis pa yin //
T02TD1809E:130b-29: dzny'a na zhes pa gsum pa yin //
T02TD1809E:130b-30: bzhi pa badzra ming can te //
T02TD1809E:130b-31: sva bh'a wa a'atma ko lnga pa //
T02TD1809E:131a-0: @131a * // drug pa aa ham zhes su brjod //
T02TD1809E:131a-1: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa drug / skye bo mchog la bstan pa yin //
T02TD1809E:131a-2: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zung dang po'o //
T02TD1809E:131a-3: dzny'a na badzra gnyis pa yin //
T02TD1809E:131a-4: sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham gsum pa yin //
T02TD1809E:131a-5: de nyid gsum du 'di ru bstan //
T02TD1809E:131a-6: de nyid gsum ni gcig tu 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:131a-7: gsal dang mi gsal ming can te //
T02TD1809E:131a-8: gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin gang zhig / gsum gyi brda dang ldan pa'i mi //
T02TD1809E:131a-9: spyan drangs gshegs su gsol pa dang //
T02TD1809E:131a-10: de bzhin du ni bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD1809E:131a-11: 'jug pa yis ni spyan drangs te //
T02TD1809E:131a-12: myur ba yis ni gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1809E:131a-13: dal ba yis ni de bzhugs 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:131a-14: dag pa las ni dngos grub mchog / skyes bu de de'i spyor ba yis //
T02TD1809E:131a-15: phyag rgya chen po gcig tu 'gyur //
T02TD1809E:131a-16: myur ba la sogs gsum ldan pa //
T02TD1809E:131a-17: phyag rgya sgrub par bshad pa yin //
T02TD1809E:131a-18: myur dang rnam bsdus dal ba can //
T02TD1809E:131a-19: sngags su des par sbyor ba yi //
T02TD1809E:131a-20: slob dpon gyis ni 'bang pa yis //
T02TD1809E:131a-21: slob ma'i rna ba'i drung du brjod //
T02TD1809E:131a-22: dpal gsang ba 'dus pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par gzhag pa'i rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o /
T02TD1809E:131a-24: // / grub pa'i slob dpon klu'i blo'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rnam par gzhag pa'i rim pa bzhi pa rdzogs so//
